snippet: Seven likely mayoral candidates met to discuss the city’s transportation at a forum at the City University of New York.
abstract: Seven expected New York City mayoral candidates attend transit forum in Manhattan to advertise their support for public transportation; notably absent is Joseph J Lhota, Republican who resigned as chairman of the Metropolitan Transportation Authority in December to pursue mayoral run.

headline.main: Candidates at a Forum All Support Mass Transit
headline.print_headline: Candidates At a Forum All Support Mass Transit

snippet: A federal judge ordered Apple to halt collecting shareholder votes on a proposal to change some of its corporate charter, handing a victory to the hedge fund manager David Einhorn.
abstract: A federal judge ordered Apple to halt collecting shareholder votes on a proposal to change some of its corporate charter, handing a victory to the hedge fund manager David Einhorn.

headline.main: Judge Sides With Einhorn and Halts an Apple Shareholder Vote
headline.print_headline: U.S. Judge Halts an Apple Shareholder Vote

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

snippet: Prosecutors, shifting strategy, are building a new model for Wall Street cases. | Morgan Stanley is striving to coordinate two departments often at odds. | Andrew Ross Sorkin says Steven L. Rattner’s reputation, once sullied, has acquired a new sh...
abstract: Prosecutors, shifting strategy, are building a new model for Wall Street cases. | Morgan Stanley is striving to coordinate two departments often at odds. | Andrew Ross Sorkin says Steven L. Rattner’s reputation, once sullied, has acquired a new shine.

headline.main: Week in Review: Sweeping Changes or a Symbolic Reprimand?

snippet: After watching Egyptian protesters battle the police, and taking part in a demonstration in Italy, an Italian animator created Riot, a new video game.
abstract: After watching Egyptian protesters battle the police, and taking part in a demonstration in Italy, an Italian animator created Riot, a new video game.

headline.main: Video Game Inspired by Clashes in Egypt and Italy Allows Gamers to Fight the Police

snippet: The colorful skin of an apple, grape or tomato is certainly chockfull of nutrients. But by no means are the outer layers of most fruits and vegetables the prime source of their nutrition.
abstract: The colorful skin of an apple, grape or tomato is certainly chockfull of nutrients. But by no means are the outer layers of most fruits and vegetables the prime source of their nutrition.

headline.main: Ask Well: The Nutrients in Fruits and Veggies

snippet: The National Futures Association faced an obstacle in considering a lifetime ban for Jon S. Corzine: he isn’t a member. | Citigroup, a closely watched player in the debate over Wall Street compensation, is changing how it calculates bonuses for to...
abstract: The National Futures Association faced an obstacle in considering a lifetime ban for Jon S. Corzine: he isn’t a member. | Citigroup, a closely watched player in the debate over Wall Street compensation, is changing how it calculates bonuses for top executives. | David Einhorn has a name for the preferred shares he wants Apple to give to shareholders: iPrefs. | Europe thinks it has found a way to keep firms from avoiding a proposed tax on financial transactions.

snippet: Like the Taskbar in Windows, the Mac’s Dock can also be relocated to other edges of the desktop.
abstract: Like the Taskbar in Windows, the Mac’s Dock can also be relocated to other edges of the desktop.

snippet: Though Hewlett-Packard is battling a declining demand for personal computers, the computer maker’s quarterly results were better than expected.
abstract: Hewlett-Packard reports that first-quarter net income fell 16 percent, to $1.23 billion, or 63 cents a share, from $1.47 billion, or 73 cents in year-ago period; revenue fell 6 percent, to $28.36 billion; though HP is battling declining demand for personal computers, computer maker's results are better than expected..

headline.main: Declaring This a Year for Fixing and Rebuilding, H.P. Posts Lower Profit
headline.print_headline: Declaring This a Year for Fixing and Rebuilding, H.P. Posts Lower Profit

snippet: The danger of the decoupling of productivity and pay is not structural unemployment. The problem is what kind of jobs, at what kind of salaries, the new technologically driven economy will generate.

headline.main: When Work and Wages Come Apart
headline.print_headline: When Work and Wages Come Apart
